pages.text: Dimlite is a new metal added by Terramity.$(br2)Dimlite can be obtained by crafting together untapped dimlite and echo shards.$(br2)Dimlite ore can be found in a uniform pattern in the overworld, between Y=-44 and Y=-64.

pages.title: Dimlite
pages.text: Dimlite holds the power of the deep dark.
The smithing template drops from Gob, King of Gnomes, and must be used on netherite to upgrade.
